LanguageData.RTDC_EnableModDesc: If disabled, all features will stop working.
LanguageData.RTDC_ShowHistoryTabDesc: If disabled, you can only open the history window via Mod Settings.
LanguageData.RTDC_EnableRimTalkNameColoringDesc: Colors the small names at the top of the RimTalk window based on rules.
LanguageData.RTDC_EnableChatColoringDesc: Chat bubbles and log content will be colored.
LanguageData.RTDC_EnableBubblesSyncDesc: If Interaction Bubbles mod is installed, bubbles will also be colored.
LanguageData.RTDC_HistoryInfo: Note: System keeps max 200 recent logs. Older logs are cleared automatically.
LanguageData.RTDC_OpenHistoryWindowDesc: Opens a standalone, resizable window to manage history logs. Reduces settings menu lag.
LanguageData.RTDC_EnableForFriendliesDesc: Apply to allied and neutral factions.
LanguageData.RTDC_UseFactionColorDesc: If no custom name color is defined, try to use the pawn's faction color.
LanguageData.RTDC_AutoFavColorDesc: If Biotech DLC is active, try to use the favorite color from the pawn's genes.
LanguageData.RTDC_AutoApplyBoldDesc: Whether automatically fetched colors should be bold by default.
LanguageData.RTDC_EnableSelfTalkColorDesc: Content wrapped in brackets ()（）** 【】 is treated as action or thought.
LanguageData.RTDC_EnableRainbowDesc: Speaking becomes rainbow-colored after drinking a specific potion.
LanguageData.RTDC_EnableBWDesc: Speaking becomes black and white after drinking a specific potion.
LanguageData.RTDC_ManageNamesDesc: Enter a name (e.g., Rat) and click Add. Highest priority.
LanguageData.RTDC_ManageKeywordsDesc: These words will automatically be colored when they appear in dialogue.
LanguageData.RTDC_DrinkSoup: drank a mysterious soup and feels their way of speaking has changed!
LanguageData.RTDC_AutoExportHistoryDesc: Automatically save as HTML and clear the log when the limit (200 lines) is reached. If disabled, logs are simply cleared without saving.
LanguageData.RTDC_EnableForNonHumansDesc: Apply color to animals or mechs if they can speak.
